betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oThe Buildcraft Heat Exchanger is used to move fluids from various states, in order of temperature: Cool, Hot, Searing.

To heat up a fluid, it must be placed as a cold input in the Heat Exchanger multiblock (see preview for multiblock structure, inputs, outputs), using lava as a hot input.

To cool down a fluid, it must be placed as a hot input, with a fluid of a lower temperature as the cold input.
